scripts.start:demo: pnpm run prisma && concurrently --kill-others 'pnpm --filter api.schoen-klinik dev' 'pnpm --filter ui.public.schoen-klinik dev' 'pnpm --filter ui.back-office.schoen-klinik dev'
scripts.prisma: pnpm --filter api.schoen-klinik prisma:gen && pnpm --filter api.schoen-klinik run prisma:db:push && pnpm --filter ui.public.schoen-klinik run prisma:gen && pnpm --filter ui.public.schoen-klinik run prisma:db:push
